entry.title: Web API Mashups in a Python Application
entry.summary:
Summary

[EuroPython 2011] Johan Euphrosine - 21 June 2011 in "Track Tagliatelle"

Description

This talk will cover: - How to use OAuth into your webapp so users can give permission to access their data stored in third party web application. - How your webapp can interact with their Web API using RESTful JSON protocols.

This talk is suitable for beginners already familiar with any WSGI web framework.

This talk will be illustrated with code samples using Google App Engine and Google APIs client library.
